oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Farming for a New Millennium - status and future challenges
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
"Organics" in general
Markets and trade
Crop husbandry
Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The proceedings contains abstracts of all papers and posters presented at the seminar. A few papers that arrived later were published in an attachment. See attached documents.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists and Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Løes, Anne-Kristin (Ed.) (2005) Organic Farming for a New Millennium - status and future challenges. Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists and Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences, 1, NJF Report, no. 1. Proceedings of NJF seminar 369 Organic Farming for a New Millennium - status and future challenges., Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences, Alnarp, Sweden, June 15-17, 2005.
